title: Blossom time: a romance in the music of Franz Schubert
creator_credit: Paul Stein and British International Pictures
brief_description: When Schubert (played by Richard Tauber) realizes his love for Vickie is not returned, he helps her overcome the obstacles of the court to find happiness with the man she does love. Throughout the film Tauber sings several of Schubert’s lieder. Music specially adapted and composed by G.H. Clutsam. Cast includes Jane Baxter, Carl Esmond, Athene Seyler, Paul Graetz, Charles Carson, Marguerite Allen.
